faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Your questions and concerns, answered here.

faqs.q: Are there really no extra charges?
faqs.a: That's right, no fees other than the estimate provided at the time of contract will be incurred. However, if you wish to add features later for your own reasons, a separate estimate will be provided.
It varies depending on the plan, site scale, and preparation of materials, but a standard plan typically takes about 1 to 1.5 months.

faqs.q: Can I update it even if I'm not good with computers?
faqs.a: Yes, rest assured. For areas you'll update yourself, like blogs or announcements, we implement a system that's as easy to use as a smartphone app.

faqs.q: Is there support after the site launch?
faqs.a: Yes, all plans come with one month of free support after launch. This covers questions about how to operate it and minor corrections. If you wish for continued support beyond that, we offer separate maintenance plans.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.description: Omiseweb is dedicated to fully supporting foreign owners who are challenging the business world in Japan, overcoming the walls of language, culture, and digital.

sections.title: Our Mission
sections.content: Our mission is to lead the businesses of foreign owners to success with the power of digital, especially for those who have wonderful services or products but face challenges in online communication. Through soulful, original websites—not templates—we deliver the true value of your shop to fans in Japan.

sections.title: Why Choose Us?
sections.content: Our founder has personal experience in international business and deeply understands the importance and difficulties of cross-cultural communication. That's why we prioritize not just technical support, but also careful consultation in your native language. We take the passion for your business, understand its cultural context, and express it in a way that is optimized for the Japanese market.

worksPage.title: Our Works
worksPage.description: Here are some of the success stories we have created for our clients' businesses. See the quality of our design and the results it has produced.

cases.name: Chinese Restaurant 'Ryuteki Kitchen'
cases.description: To convey the charm of a restaurant that fuses traditional taste with a modern space, we focused on a luxurious design and appetizing photos. An online reservation system was also introduced.
cases.before: The old site didn't convey its charm, and reservations were phone-only.
cases.after: With a design refresh and web reservations, new customers in their 20s-30s and bookings increased 1.5x!

cases.name: Thai Massage 'Siam Healing'
cases.description: To convey a healing space and authentic treatments, we used a calm color palette and relaxing images. The treatment menu is presented clearly to smoothly guide users to web reservations.
cases.before: Information was outdated and hard to see on smartphones, struggling to attract new clients.
cases.after: Achieved a 200% month-over-month increase in new web bookings with mobile optimization!

cases.name: Korean Style Cafe 'Seoul Cafe'
cases.description: Expressed the cuteness of the Instagrammable menu and space. To appeal to a young female target, we incorporated a pop design and video content to establish a brand image.
cases.before: Only had Instagram, lacking credibility without an official website.
cases.after: Strengthened branding by launching an official site, leading to more media inquiries!

cases.name: International School
cases.description: We focused on clearly communicating the educational philosophy and curriculum features to parents. In addition to multilingual support, we built a system for frequent updates of student testimonials and event information.
cases.before: Information was scattered, making it difficult for prospective students to find what they needed.
cases.after: By reorganizing the site structure and improving the inquiry form, applications for information sessions doubled.
